item.title: CVE-2024-27195|2024-06-04T17:46:55.780Z -- sandi%20verdev -- watermark%20reloaded
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Sandi Verdev Watermark RELOADED allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Watermark RELOADED: from n/a through 1.3.5.
